table.name: vtiger_autonumberprefix
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_autonumberprefix` ( `autonumberprefixid` int(11) NOT NULL, `prefix` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `semodule` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `format` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `active` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `current` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `default` varchar(100) NOT NULL, index (`prefix`), index (`semodule`), index (`format`), index (`active`), index (`current`), index (`default`), PRIMARY KEY (`autonumberprefixid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_autonumberprefixcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_autonumberprefixcf` ( `autonumberprefixid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`autonumberprefixid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
